TopicTitle: Manually unlocking parts in career mode (by changing files) ?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys !

I've following problem:

I have a pretty cool mod which is up and runnin' expect for one major issue - It's not supported in career mode ! By not supported I mean that the parts aren't unlockable.

Is there a way to manually change the correct files and just mark the parts I want as "unlocked" ?

Thanks in advance !
Hi Dareptor, if you add it manually to your persistent.sfs it should work, back it up first and look at how other parts are listed in the save.
Allright thanks I'll try it out ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Okay I've taken a look at the file but it's several thousand lines long and there is no way I'm gonna find what I need to change without a bit more detailed instructions. Where exactly do I have to add / change the code ?
